body.name: SAFEE MRROR Wall Mirrors for Bedroom Door,Unbreakable Full Length Wall Mirror Tiles,shatterproof Mirror for Kids 4 Pack 10"x10",Workout for Home Gym Body,Closet Mirror Wall,Home Gym Mirror
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 39 mins
features: Acrylic material, environmentally friendly organic glass mirror, not easy to break, safer than regular glass mirror, perfect replacement for real mirror, very suitable for DIY
Each mirror is 10 inches x 10 inches in size and consists of four pieces, which can be shaped according to your needs. Frameless mirrors can decorate your house and illuminate your beauty.
Easy to install, without drilling, using high adhesive tape that can firmly adhere to the mirror on the wall without falling off. Remove surface protective film after installation

It can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, ceramic tile walls, furniture, or wooden doors, but is not suitable for wallpaper, ash walls, damp walls, bubble walls, or uneven walls. After fixing, do not move freely
100% satisfied service - If you have any dissatisfaction or issues, please feel free to send us an email and we will do our best to solve your problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Has TWO Layers of Protective Film - Remove Both!
reviews.reviewText: This is a large unbreakable mirror that can be set at any height you need. When I first tried this, I peeled off one layer of protective film. We installed it in the shower to shave my face. It didn’t fog up, but the image wasn’t completely clear. Then I read a review of a similar item that reported TWO layers of film. They were right, there are TWO layers of film, and removing the second layer makes this easy to view. Images are now clear, and I can shave safely in the shower. Highly recommended item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does What it Needs
reviews.reviewText: I have this weird problem where every few days while showering I get an eyelash in my eye and I have to spend the rest of the shower with an eye closed. Figure why not get a mirror to help me get it out?I didn't do any cleaning on the tile wall before I stuck it on and it hasn't fallen off after a few weeks. I've let all kinds of soap and water get on it and haven't wiped it down or anything and it's still perfectly clear enough for me to see. Does exactly what I needed to do and my super small inconvenience is no problem anymore.Also weird to see myself in the various stages of soaps in my hair, ears, face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Delivers function with safety,
reviews.reviewText: This hanging shower mirror is a two piece unit. The hook affixes to the wall with an adhesive and the mirror dangles from the hook, via a whole in the mirror. Though the manner of installation left much to be desired, I am able to safely shave in the shower now without fear of the mirror dropping and shattering glass all over the shower floor. Thanks to the plexiglass fabrication, this lightweight mirror will not shatter with a fall and provides a clear reflection to work from. I would definitely seek this mirror out again as an option to mirrors for the shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a mirror but it has a slight haze.
reviews.reviewText: Update: I increased the star rating. I noticed that there was an additional protection film on the mirror that was really difficult to catch an edge and remove. Once I removed that, the mirror is now much better.It works for my intended usage but it haze a slight haze. I did take off the protective plastic and even tried cleaning it. Don't expect a glass mirror reflection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My old mirror fell and shattered at my feet after the suction cup became loose. This mirror will not shatter. its made out of some sort of plastic that resembles the back of a coaches clipboard. It has a wide, crystal clear view that has not fogged or gotten any signs of hard water stain on it since i began using it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can see when I shave!
reviews.reviewText: I never gave it much thought before, but after seeing this shower mirror and picking it up I'm now wondering why I never thought about getting one before. I always shave in the shower, and then I would sometimes get out and noticed that I missed a spot and have to touch up once I was already drying off. But no more! This mirror is about the size of a sheet of paper, is as clear as a bell, and didn't actually fog up while I showered. It comes with a hook that sticks to the shower wall (clean and dry first of course), and so far it has held up fine. I love it! One thing I will mention. Mine came with 2 coatings of that thin, invisible plastic that you have to peel off. After I peeled off the first, it still looked a bit hazy, that's when I discovered I had a second layer to peel off. Once I did it was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice mirror but not fog free
reviews.reviewText: For a plastic mirror, this provides a very clear reflection. It is not really fog free. Any cold mirror will fog up in a hot shower. It is possible to warm this mirror up by holding it under the running water for a minute. The water does seem to bead up on it as if it has some kind of Rain X coating. It comes with a hook with double-sided tape. I chose to use a suction cup. Overall, this is a good mirror but not fog free

reviews.reviewerName: The Honest Review GuyThe Honest Review Guy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick
reviews.reviewText: This works out pretty well. It doesn’t get really all that foggy, and the way I managed to drop it, it held up just fine (just a scuff). I appreciate that it came with a little sticker hook thing as well.
